items.ja: Rosenior 'ready' for Chelsea job
items.en: Rosenior 'ready' for Chelsea job
items.text_for_match:
Rosenior 'ready' for Chelsea job Speaking in his last press conference as Strasbourg manager, Liam Rosenior says taking the job at Chelsea is the right move for his career. 
The 41-year-old has spent the last 18-months at the Blues' sister club Strasbourg after he was sacked from Hull City in 2024. Speaking in his last press conference as Strasbourg manager, Liam Rosenior says taking the job at Chelsea is the right move for his career.

items.ja: 'I'm here to be manager, not coach' - but will Amorim survive at Man Utd?
items.en: 'I'm here to be manager, not coach' - but will Amorim survive at Man Utd?
items.text_for_match: 'I'm here to be manager, not coach' - but will Amorim survive at Man Utd? Ruben Amorim challenges Manchester United's board to let him do his job after Sunday's draw with Leeds, and says he intends to leave in 18 months' time. items.ja: 'Maybe you know better than me!' - Guardiola defends performance
items.en: 'Maybe you know better than me!' - Guardiola defends performance
items.text_for_match: 'Maybe you know better than me!' - Guardiola defends performance Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says how his side defended and played outside the final third was "extraordinary" and disagrees with Man City having a lack of momentum after failing to secure a second goal in a 1-1 draw against managerless Chelsea at the Etihad.
